messages.content: execute day scene in living room

function.name: create_scene_variation
function.description: Creates a scene by setting multiple device states to match a mood (e.g., 'party vibe'). Use this tool alone for scenes. pass valid field names

id.description: pass the id of the device here (device_id)

name.description: pass the name of the device here (device_name)

onOffState.description: send the on/off state of the device..., true for on, false for off

brightness.description: pass the brightness of the device...

items.description: this state will be showed to user...

devices.description: pass the list of devices with suitable states...

room_area.description: pass the name of area of the room if available, include all the lights in the room if no area is specified

function.name: save_scene
function.description: Saves a scene with the current device states

scene_name.description: Name of the scene to save

function.name: control_device
function.description: use this tool to control a single device, or to change the state of a single device

device_id.description: pass the id of the device here

device_name.description: pass the name of the device here

onOffState.description: send the on/off state of the device..., true for on, false for off

brightness.description: pass the brightness of the device...

function.name: execute_scene
function.description: use this tool to execute or apply a preconfigured scene in a room

scene_name.description: pass the name of the scene here

room_name.description: pass the name of the room here

scene_id.description: pass id of the scene here

messages.content: can you please tell me which room this device exists
